1. 2025 NFL playoff picture, bracket: Buccaneers land final NFC playoff spot, Packers stuck with seventh seed  CBS Sports
  2. NFL Week 18 contract incentives: Mike Evans earns $3 million bonus on final play of season  Yahoo Sports
  3. Bucs clinch South, help Evans reach 1K yards late  ESPN
  4. Buccaneers clinch fourth consecutive NFC South crown, fifth straight playoff berth  NFL.com
  5. Tampa Bay Buccaneers wide receiver Mike Evans makes NFL history, helps lead team to playoff berth  CNN
